bibl.title: Is There an Alexandrian Style - What Is Egyptian about It?
bibl.note: There is one constant of Alexandrian style, at least in the smaller arts: quality of craftsmanship. It was in perfectly good Egyptian tradition.

bibl.title: Alexandria and Alexandrianism. Papers Delivered at a Symposium Organized by The J. Paul Getty Museum and The Getty Center for the History of Art and the Humanities and Held at the Museum. April 22-25, 1993

bibl.seg: KOZLOFF Arielle P., Is There an Alexandrian Style - What Is Egyptian about It?

Alexandria and Alexandrianism. Papers Delivered at a Symposium Organized by The J. Paul Getty Museum and The Getty Center for the History of Art and the Humanities and Held at the Museum. April 22-25, 1993 (Malibu, 1996) pp. 247-260, 9 figg.
There is one constant of Alexandrian style, at least in the smaller arts: quality of craftsmanship. It was in perfectly good Egyptian tradition.
